SELECT b.post_id, m.nickname, m_img.server_file_name AS profile_image, b.content, b_img.server_file_name, tag.tag_content FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Members m ON m.user_no = b.user_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT idx, server_file_name FROM ImageTable it WHERE category = '회원') AS m_img on m_img.idx = m.user_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT idx, server_file_name FROM ImageTable it WHERE category = '피드' GROUP BY idx) AS b_img ON b_img.idx = b.post_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT ft.post_id, GROUP_CONCAT(t.tag_content SEPARATOR ' ') AS tag_content FROM FeedTags ft LEFT JOIN Tags t ON ft.tag_id =t.tag_id GROUP BY ft.post_id) AS tag ON tag.post_id = b.post_id WHERE b.category = '피드' AND b.is_hidden = 0 ORDER BY b.date DESC LIMIT 20;
